meanings.definition: The quality or state of being folkish.
meanings.sent1: The folkishnesses of the small town were evident in their love for traditional music.
meanings.sent2: She studied the folkishnesses of different cultures for her anthropology project.
meanings.sent3: The folkishnesses of the neighborhood were on full display during the annual folk festival.
meanings.sent4: His deep connection to his roots showed in the folkishnesses of his art.
meanings.sent5: The folkishnesses of the community were celebrated through dance and song.

meanings.definition: The beliefs, customs, or traditions of a particular group of people.
meanings.sent1: The folkishnesses of the tribe were passed down through generations.
meanings.sent2: She embraced the folkishnesses of her heritage with pride.
meanings.sent3: The folkishnesses of the family included a special recipe for holiday cookies.
meanings.sent4: In the melting pot of the city, diverse folkishnesses blended together.
meanings.sent5: The folkishnesses of the region were reflected in the colorful tapestries woven by the locals.
